body_html:
I've also encountered this when building Caffe2 in a submodule. Solved it myself with this commit: kleisauke@f247ee2.

I'm not going to open a PR, because I'm not sure if this is the right solution (for e.g. ATen is still built in ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/aten). You may use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.
body_text:
I've also encountered this when building Caffe2 in a submodule. Solved it myself with this commit: kleisauke@f247ee2.
I'm not going to open a PR, because I'm not sure if this is the right solution (for e.g. ATen is still built in ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/aten). You may use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.
body:
I've also encountered this when building Caffe2 in a submodule. Solved it myself with this commit: https://github.com/kleisauke/pytorch/commit/f247ee200f359768722e04e7c374665b394d9f42.

I'm not going to open a PR, because I'm not sure if this is the right solution (for e.g. ATen is still built in `${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}/aten`). You may use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.
